oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Excerpt from Darla Tanner Oral History Interview, 2011 April 13
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
Excerpt from an oral history interview with Darla Tanner, conducted on April 13, 2011 by Jared Brennan as part of the Flood 2010 Digital History Project. Darla Tanner describes the damage to her business Williams Wholesale Supply of Nashville and the support she received in the aftermath of the flood.
The complete interview is available in the Special Collections Division.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Tanner, Darla--Interviews
